en.summaryText: Test Engineer with over 9 years of experience in Quality Assurance specializing in web, mobile, and backend testing. Throughout these years, I have worked not only performing manual testing but also with test automation. My previous two years of professional experience in customer support provided me with a great understanding of customer expectations and mindset.
